input.sentences: these three people gather and show off their costumes .
the lady with the pink hair introduces herself to the dog | who is also dressed for the occasion .
this beautiful lady is an angel and the person who she is next to is a duck .
this devil lady holds the dog in her arms | refusing to let him go . the dog is sad .
this dog vows vengeance on the person who put this horrible mask on him . he is going to get him for this .
output.sentences: Many people dressed in costumes gathered together in the kitchen.
It must be a happy occasion as the pink lady gave me water from her cup.
I do not like the person dressed as a duck, so I shall chase him and his lady.
Oh no, the evil lady is refusing to put down my sad friend.
I vow to get vengeance on this person and the people who dress so crazy.
